characters.name: Cid Kagenou
characters.description:
__Race:__ Human

Cid Kagenou, under the moniker of "Shadow," is the founder and leader of the secret organization "Shadow Garden." He founded the organization to help realize his fantasy of becoming an “Eminence in Shadow". However, unbeknownst to him, his fabrications are often revealed to be quite genuine in reality. Cid is the reincarnation of Minoru Kagenou. 

(Source: The Eminence in Shadow Wiki)

characters.name: Alpha
characters.description:
__Race:__ Elf

Alpha is the second-in-command of Shadow Garden. After being cured of Demon Possession by [Cid Kagenou](https://anilist.co/character/136837/Cid-Kagenou), she would devote her life to his cause, becoming the first member to be recruited into his organization, Shadow Garden. 

~!She is the descendant of the elf [Hero Olivier](https://anilist.co/character/204203/Olivier).!~

(Source: To Be a Power in the Shadows! Wiki)

characters.name: Beta
characters.description:
__Race:__ Elf

Beta is the second member of Shadow Garden, supporting her master [Shadow](https://anilist.co/character/136837/Cid-Kagenou) against the Order of Diabolos. 

~!Outside of her Shadow Garden activities, she adopts the identity of Natsume Kafka, an up-and-coming author of numerous original pieces of literature.!~

characters.name: Gamma
characters.description:
__Race:__ Elf

Gamma is a member of Shadow Garden, being third of the original [Shadow](https://anilist.co/character/136837/Cid-Kagenou) Seven as well as the director of the Mitsugoshi Company. Despite her lack of coordination, Gamma's knowledge has allowed her to recreate many of the items described by her master [Shadow](https://anilist.co/character/136837/Cid-Kagenou) to sell as Mitsugoshi's exclusive products.

(Source: To Be a Power in the Shadows! Wiki)

characters.name: Delta
characters.description:
__Race:__ Beastkin

Delta is a member of Shadow Garden, being fourth of the original Shadow Seven to join the organization after her Demonic Possession was healed by her master [Shadow](https://anilist.co/character/136837/Cid-Kagenou). As the most physically gifted of the Seven, Delta is also often the most destructive and brutal of the group due to her lack of sense and self-control.

(Source: To Be a Power in the Shadows! Wiki)

characters.name: Epsilon
characters.description:
__Race:__ Elf

Epsilon is the fifth member of Shadow Garden. Due to her insecurities with having a flat-chest, she manipulated her slime bodysuit every year to slowly increase the mass on her chest, eventually developing a fake large breast. As a consequence of this, she developed extreme magic control earning her the title, "The Precision."

(Source: To Be a Power in the Shadows! Wiki)

characters.name: Claire Kagenou
characters.description:
__Race:__ Human

Claire is the older sister of [Cid Kagenou](https://anilist.co/character/136837/Cid-Kagenou) and heir to the Kagenou Family.

(Source: To Be a Power in the Shadows! Wiki)

characters.name: Alexia Midgar
alt_names: アレクシア・ミドガル
characters.description:
__Race:__ Human

Alexia Midgar is the second princess of the Kingdom of Midgar and younger sister of [Iris Midgar](https://anilist.co/character/204204/Iris--Midgar). She is also a student of Midgar Royal Spellsword Academy.

(Source: To Be a Power in the Shadows! Wiki)

characters.name: Rose Oriana
characters.description:
__Race:__ Human

Rosa Oriana is a noble Princess from the Oriana kingdom. She is known for being a genius in art in her kingdom. However, she came to Midgar Royal Spellsword Academy in order to learn swordsmanship.

~!Later [Alpha](https://anilist.co/character/162246/Alpha) discovered Rose, who became a fugitive for assassinating her father and was then offered membership into Shadow Garden.!~

(Source: To Be a Power in the Shadows! Wiki)

characters.name: Nu
characters.description:
__Race:__ Human

Nu is the thirteenth member of Shadow Garden and an employee of Mitsugoshi Company. 

(Source: To Be a Power in the Shadows! Wiki)

characters.name: Sherry Barnett
alt_names: シェリー・バーネット
characters.description:
__Race:__ Human

Sherry Barnett is a student of Midgar Royal Spellsword Academy. She is also the adopted daughter of Lutheran Barnett.

(Source: To Be a Power in the Shadows! Wiki)

characters.name: Annerose Nichtsehen
alt_names: アンネローゼ・フシアナス
Annerose of the Velgata Seven Blades
characters.description:
__Race:__ Human

She is a Dark Knight of the Velgalta Empire. Originally a member of "Velgalta's Seven Blades," she abandoned her position to embark on a journey of self-improvement.
While participating in the Bushin Festival to test her strength, she was left impressed by Mundane Mann's ability and is now training to reach his level.
While she possesses skills and brains, she can sometimes be a little klutzy.

characters.name: Olivier
characters.description:
__Race:__ Elf

Olivier is one of the three heroes that managed to defeat the demon Diabolos. As a result, her descendants were cursed by the demon.

(Source: To Be a Power in the Shadows! Wiki)

characters.name: Iris  Midgar
characters.description:
__Race:__ Human

Iris Midgar is the first princess of the Kingdom of Midgar and older sister of [Alexia Midgar](https://anilist.co/character/168799/Alexia-Midgar). She is also leader of the Crimson Order. 

(Source: *The Eminence in Shadow* Wiki)

characters.name: Aurora
characters.description:
__Race:__ Human

A woman known as the Calamity Witch who once brought chaos and destruction to the world. In the Goddess' Trial in the Sacred Land, she is summoned in reaction to Cid's presence and does battle with him in the form of Shadow. Her body is sealed in the sanctuary, and after helping Cid to escape she disappears together with its destruction. 

~!Aurora's true identity is the great demon Diabolos but it is unknown if she founded the Order of Diabolos or cursed the three heroes with possession. !~
